topSection.heading: King of all Contracts
topSection.title: 100% Decentralized
topSection.desc: Tron Trx is the perfect combination of Digital Technology, High Security and Community Program

sections.title: Decentralized
sections.desc: There is no 3rd Party Management managing your funds . Neither the Affiliates or the Development team have access to the project smart contact once it is deployed on the blockchain.

sections.title: Transparency
sections.desc: All codes used to develop the project are visible for community members to look at. Also, all transactions are recorded on the Blockchain's ledger which is accessible to everyone.

sections.title: Project Insurance
sections.desc: Tron Trx's smart contract has a built in Project Insurance mechanism to protect the interests of the community.

sections.title: Longevity
sections.desc: All Anti Whale and Anti Multi Id measures along with APS and Project Insurance will ensure Longevity of the project so that everybody can reap the benefits.

sections.title: Automated Perpetual System (APS)
sections.desc: Tron Trx's smart contract has a built in APS which automatically sends all rewards to the community members thereby eliminating any scope of human intervention.

sections.title: Immutability
sections.desc: Once the project code is verified and deployed, it's the law. This means no changes or amendments can be done. Truly safe and secure.

rightSections.title: Download wallet app
rightSections.desc: Download/Install TronLink based wallet on your mobile or web browser or Klever Wallet for mobile devices.

rightSections.title: Get Tron (TRX)
rightSections.desc: You can easily acquire TRX from the most popular platforms. After purchasing TRX, you can transfer it to your personal wallet, and then transfer it to Tron Trx smart-contract address.

rightSections.title: Start Earning
rightSections.desc: Congratulations. You have joined the unique world of Tron Trx. You can find all your personal information on Wallet Statistics page and you can withdraw your money from this screen whenever you want.

cards.title: daily roi
cards.desc: There is no 3rd Party Management managing your funds . Neither the Affiliates or the Development team have access to the project smart contact once it is deployed on the blockchain

cards.title: matching income
cards.desc: Additional matching level income (As per your current level) ranging from 30%-90% of your team's daily ROI income

cards.title: referral income
cards.desc: TRON TRX's smart contract has a built in Project Insurance mechanism to protect the interests of the community

paragraphs: Requirements of Direct Referrals must be met along with Total Team Deposits Volume in order to move to next level.
All volume is calculated on your Total Team's Deposits Volume.
Matching Income is automatically calculated by APS on a daily basis.
